title: Payday 2 Dev Explains and Defends Introduction of Microtransactions
text:
Payday 2 Dev Explains and Defends Introduction of Microtransactions 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
Payday 2 developer Overkill Software has defended its recent Black Market update, which introduces optional microtransactions the team team-...
